20110117030600.000|20110117030602.000|CC1|NOWHERE, BUT IT APPEARS JARED   
20110117030602.000|20110117030604.000|CC1|LOUGHNER FOLLOWED A WELL-WORN   
20110117030604.000|20110117030605.000|CC1|PATH ON HIS FINAL DESCENT INTO  
20110117030605.000|20110117030609.000|CC1|MADNESS.                        
20110117030609.000|20110117030612.000|CC1|IN THE HOURS BEFORE THE         
20110117030612.000|20110117030613.000|CC1|MASSACRE, JARED LOUGHNER WAS    
20110117030613.000|20110117030616.000|CC1|BUSY WRAPPING UP HIS TROUBLED   
20110117030616.000|20110117030617.000|CC1|LIFE.                           
20110117030617.000|20110117030618.000|CC1|AT THIS DRUG STORE, JUST BEFORE 
20110117030618.000|20110117030619.000|CC1|MIDNIGHT, HE DROPPED OFF A ROLL 
20110117030619.000|20110117030619.000|CC1|OF FILM-- PICTURES HE SHOT OF   
20110117030619.000|20110117030624.000|CC1|HIMSELF POSING WITH HIS GUN.    
20110117030624.000|20110117030627.000|CC1|THEN HE CHECKED IN TO THIS MOTEL
20110117030627.000|20110117030629.000|CC1|TWO MILES FROM HIS HOME AND HIS 
20110117030629.000|20110117030630.000|CC1|PARENTS.                        
20110117030630.000|20110117030632.000|CC1|AT 2:00 A.M., THE MOON WAS OUT. 
20110117030632.000|20110117030634.000|CC1|IT WAS A LITTLE ABOVE FREEZING  
20110117030634.000|20110117030635.000|CC1|AND LIFE AS HE KNEW IT WOULD BE 
20110117030635.000|20110117030636.000|CC1|OVER IN ABOUT EIGHT HOURS.      
20110117030636.000|20110117030639.000|CC1|HE SEEMED UPSET AS HE SAID HIS  
20110117030639.000|20110117030639.000|CC1|GOOD-BYES.                      
20110117030639.000|20110117030640.000|CC1|IT APPEARS HE MADE ONE CALL TO A
20110117030640.000|20110117030643.000|CC1|CLOSE FRIEND.                   
20110117030643.000|20110117030644.000|CC1|THAT CALL, AT 2:05 A.M., WENT

20110117030822.000|20110117030823.000|CC1|HE WAS DRIVING AT, WHAT HE WAS

20110117030824.000|20110117030825.000|CC1|>> Conway: OH, YEAH, AND I TOLD 
20110117030825.000|20110117030826.000|CC1|HIM, I WAS LIKE, "LIKE, BECAUSE 
20110117030826.000|20110117030827.000|CC1|I READ IT AND I JUST DON'T FIND,

20110117030830.000|20110117030830.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, THAT'S WHERE THE      
20110117030830.000|20110117030833.000|CC1|MEANING IS.                     
20110117030833.000|20110117030835.000|CC1|HE... PEOPLE ARE GOING TO SAY HE
20110117030835.000|20110117030835.000|CC1|DOESN'T BELIEVE IN ANYTHING, BUT
20110117030835.000|20110117030837.000|CC1|IT'S NOT THAT HE DOESN'T BELIEVE
20110117030837.000|20110117030839.000|CC1|IN ANYTHING; HE LITERALLY       
20110117030839.000|20110117030840.000|CC1|BELIEVES IN NOTHING,            
20110117030840.000|20110117030844.000|CC1|NOTHINGNESS.                    
20110117030844.000|20110117030845.000|CC1|>> Pelley: TIERNEY AND CONWAY   
20110117030845.000|20110117030847.000|CC1|TOLD US LOUGHNER WAS INTERESTED 
20110117030847.000|20110117030847.000|CC1|IN A PHILOSOPHY CALLED NIHILISM 
20110117030847.000|20110117030848.000|CC1|THAT ESSENTIALLY SAYS LIFE IS   
20110117030848.000|20110117030851.000|CC1|MEANINGLESS.

20110117030854.000|20110117030855.000|CC1|A MAN WALKS THOUGH HIS DREAMS

20110117030902.000|20110117030903.000|CC1|DEPRESSION, STRIFE, RIOTS,      
20110117030903.000|20110117030905.000|CC1|MURDER.                         
20110117030905.000|20110117030907.000|CC1|>> Pelley: THIS CHARACTER ECHOES
20110117030907.000|20110117030909.000|CC1|SOMETHING AT THE CENTER OF      
20110117030909.000|20110117030910.000|CC1|LOUGHNER'S APPARENT DELUSIONS-- 
20110117030910.000|20110117030912.000|CC1|THAT BIG GOVERNMENT AND MEDIA   
20110117030912.000|20110117030912.000|CC1|CONSPIRE TO SILENCE THE AVERAGE 
20110117030912.000|20110117030915.000|CC1|GUY.                            
20110117030915.000|20110117030917.000|CC1|TO PROTEST HIS LACK OF VOICE,   
20110117030917.000|20110117030918.000|CC1|THE CHARACTER SETS HIMSELF ON   
20110117030918.000|20110117030921.000|CC1|FIRE.                           
20110117030921.000|20110117030923.000|CC1|LOUGHNER TOLD HIS FRIENDS       
20110117030923.000|20110117030924.000|CC1|REALITY HAS NO MORE SUBSTANCE   
20110117030924.000|20110117030926.000|CC1|THAN DREAMS.                    
20110117030926.000|20110117030927.000|CC1|>> Conway: HE WAS OBSESSED WITH 
20110117030927.000|20110117030928.000|CC1|HOW WORDS WERE MEANINGLESS, YOU 
20110117030928.000|20110117030929.000|CC1|KNOW.                           
20110117030929.000|20110117030930.000|CC1|YOU COULD SAY "THIS IS A CUP,"  
20110117030930.000|20110117030932.000|CC1|AND HE'D BE LIKE, "IS IT A CUP  
20110117030932.000|20110117030933.000|CC1|OR IS IT A POOL?                
20110117030933.000|20110117030934.000|CC1|IS IT A SHARK?                  
20110117030934.000|20110117030936.000|CC1|IS IT, YOU KNOW, AN AIRPLANE?"  
20110117030936.000|20110117030937.000|CC1|YOU KNOW?                       
20110117030937.000|20110117030939.000|CC1|>> Pelley: IN 2007, LOUGHNER    
20110117030939.000|20110117030941.000|CC1|BROUGHT ONE OF HIS NONSENSICAL  
20110117030941.000|20110117030945.000|CC1|QUESTIONS TO ONE OF             
20110117030945.000|20110117030946.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE
